decision: DISCOVERY: Change2Earn habit app for Solana Seeker | Logs habit progress as blockchain transactions to farm $SKR | Bet-against-yourself staking mechanism for accountability
reason: Initial project vision from user interview

decision: GTM STRATEGY: Short-term = SKR farmers (bootstrap user base) | Long-term = genuine habit-changers in crypto space
reason: Two-phase audience strategy - come for tokens, stay for change

decision: CORE INSIGHT: Token urgency overcomes habit procrastination | Blockchain = motivation hack, not solution | People don't postpone money opportunities
reason: Key psychological lever for product design

decision: UX: Log via button taps â†’ sign light tx (<1 cent) | Some actions need number input | Optional comments | No shame philosophy - log good AND bad actions
reason: Simplicity is critical for adoption, awareness of failures is therapeutic

decision: HABIT SETUP: Default choices by category + custom habits | Define both positive and negative actions toward goal
reason: Lower friction to start, flexibility for custom needs

decision: TX STRATEGY: No batching - each log = 1 transaction | SKR S2 rewards consistent daily activity (1-5 organic tx) + weekly scoring | Anti-sybil active
reason: Research: S2 has Activity Tracker with weekly reset, tracks dApps/daily usage/new things, genuine usage only

decision: ECONOMIC MODEL: Hybrid - SOL stakes (5% rake, losers fund winners) + $HABITS token (1B supply, activity rewards)
reason: 5% rake competitive, 1B supply standard, combines real stakes with token potential

decision: ADMIN PANEL: All tokenomics values must be adjustable (emissions, costs, boosts, rake %) via admin interface
reason: Economy needs real-time tuning based on user behavior and market conditions

decision: TIMELINE: Launch this week - VIBE CODING mode, ship fast, be ambitious
reason: Capture SKR farmers while Season 2 is hot, AI-assisted rapid development

decision: TECH STACK: PWA with Next.js - fast to ship, works on Seeker browser, can wrap native later
reason: Speed to market priority, Seeker has good browser support

decision: WALLETS: Solana Wallet Adapter + Phantom (minimum) + Seed Vault (Seeker native)
reason: Phantom for desktop/testing, Seed Vault for Seeker users

decision: SOLANA XP: User has token/NFT experience, new to Anchor - will learn custom programs
TOKEN STRATEGY: Tease $HABITS, deploy later - track activity off-chain for retroactive airdrop
reason: Faster MVP, creates FOMO, rewards early adopters, adjust tokenomics based on real data

decision: i18n: English default, next-intl setup from day 1 for easy translation later
reason: Avoid refactoring later, global audience potential

decision: DISCOVERY COMPLETE: DISCOVERY.xml generated, validated by user, ready for architecture
reason: All core requirements gathered, scope defined, constraints understood

decision: ARCH: Next.js 14 App Router + Supabase + Solana (memo tx for MVP, Anchor program later)
reason: Fastest path to ship this week, memo tx avoids program deployment complexity

decision: DESIGN SYSTEM: Option C - Bold Minimal | Primary: #FFE600 (yellow) | BG: #000 | Font: Syne + Outfit
reason: User selected brutalist high-contrast black & yellow design
